Lde/ecspride/ObjectSensitivity1;->onCrea: The method originates user personal data via getSystemService("phone") to retrieve TelephonyManager, then calls getSimSerialNumber() to obtain the SIM serial number (stored in v1). It also adds the string "123" to a LinkedList and uses the phone number "+49 1234". The sensitive data (SIM serial number and phone number) is passed to SmsManager.sendTextMessage(), which is a network transmission sink. The data is sent via SMS, constituting a data leak.
